= PhoneBook =

== Introduction ==

The PhoneBook is a web application developed with Crux Framework. This application is a basic project able to perform search, add, update and delete operations.

== Compatibility ==

 * Crux Framework +5.2.0

== Install ==

To install PhoneBook you must: 

 * Do checkout the PhoneBook in http://crux-projects.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/phonebook
